entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 07:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -28.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
